Full Stack Developer at Merlin

Feb 2017 - Jul 2017

I worked as a full stack developer at this small startup. The company developed a platform to connect immigration agents to students who want to study in Australia, mostly focusing on students and agents from Asia. I mostly worked on the platform backend in Django and AWS.

Software developer at Netlight

Jul 2016 - Oct 2016

I worked as a temporary software developer for the internal IT department. My job focused on developing the Monitoring project, which focuses on increasing and improving the system monitoring. The system monitoring base is in Nagios, but I mostly wrote Python scripts to check the health on different kinds of servers and web services.

Master in Media Technology

2011 - 2016

I have a master in Media Technology at Link√∂pings University. The education focuses on math and programming. It can be described as a mix of computer graphics, visualization, and user design. It is a broad program and during it, I had the opportunity to study fields as AI, procedural methods, data mining and data visualization.

Research scholar at NASA

Mar 2016 - Jul 2016

I wrote my Master Thesis at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center in the US, Maryland. The thesis focused on space weather visualization. I integrated the science tool iSWA into a project called OpenSpace. The video shows the effect of the St. Patric's day solar storm of 2015 on the global magnetosphere pressure, visualized in OpenSpace.

Exange student at Stanford

2014 - 2015

I studied for one year as an exchange student at Stanford University. I took courses in Computer Science topics including AI, Data Mining, and Computer Graphics. I really learned what it meant to study hard and got a glimpse of Silicon Valley.

TetrisAI

Artificial Intelligence, Principles and Techniques

A Tetris playing AI written in Python. The video shows the AI doing its thing. The code is on github.

The PBRT Side of the Moon

Computer Graphics, Image Synthesis Techniques

An extension of the pbrt renderer. We extended it with dispersion and photon volume integration. The goal was recreate the classic album cover by Pink Floyd in a physically based rendering. The result is shown below and the code can be found on github .

Tilt

Interactive Computer Graphics

A mobile game with hand drawn assets made with Unity. The video below shows some gameplay.

Procedural Road Generation

Procedural Methods for Images

A procedural generated road network mostly for the web, mostly written in javascript. Check it out more information and the project at roads.piwell.se and the code at github

2D SPH Fluids

Modelling Project

A multi-threaded Smoothed Particle hydrodynamic fluid simulation written in C++. The code is on github.

Creature Evolution

Artificial Intelligence for Interactive Media

A creature evolution project for the web written mostly in javascript. Check it out on evo.piwell.se or the code at github. Below is a video of an example run of the algorithm.

SGCTSky

3-D Computer Graphics

A cloud and sky simulation for dome theaters. Using Preetham scattering written as a GLSL shader and SGCT to render it on a dome. The video below shows the result on a flat computer monitor.

Ladybug - Game on mobile cluster

Media Technology - Bachelor Project

A game on mobile clusters for Android phones. We created a way to connect multiple screens to form a virtual game board with real world positions. The made a fun game around that mechanic. An explanation video i shown below and the code can be found on github .
